Title: Relates to restricting the disclosure of health care information
Summary: Prohibits any person from disclosing health care information or personal information to a person who engages in the business of accessing and compiling information for commercial purposes or whose use of such information will be in connection with the marketing of a product or service without the explicit written authorization of the data subject.
LawCode: Add ยง18-b, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to restricting the disclosure of health care information
